title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview is not wrapped. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should have a smaller size. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed. The signature preview should be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: To reproduce, try changing a parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
